nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.customization
Interface BaseCustomFieldService<CF extends CustomField>

Type Parameters:
CF - The custom field type
All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
AdCustomFieldService, AdCustomFieldServiceLocal, AdminCustomFieldService, AdminCustomFieldServiceLocal, BaseCustomFieldServiceLocal<CF>, BaseGlobalCustomFieldService<CF>, LoanGroupCustomFieldService, LoanGroupCustomFieldServiceLocal, MemberCustomFieldService, MemberCustomFieldServiceLocal, MemberRecordCustomFieldService, MemberRecordCustomFieldServiceLocal, OperatorCustomFieldService, OperatorCustomFieldServiceLocal, PaymentCustomFieldService, PaymentCustomFieldServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdCustomFieldServiceImpl, AdCustomFieldServiceSecurity, AdminCustomFieldServiceImpl, AdminCustomFieldServiceSecurity, BaseCustomFieldServiceImpl, BaseGlobalCustomFieldServiceImpl, LoanGroupCustomFieldServiceImpl, LoanGroupCustomFieldServiceSecurity, MemberCustomFieldServiceImpl, MemberCustomFieldServiceSecurity, MemberRecordCustomFieldServiceImpl, MemberRecordCustomFieldServiceSecurity, OperatorCustomFieldServiceImpl, OperatorCustomFieldServiceSecurity, PaymentCustomFieldServiceImpl, PaymentCustomFieldServiceSecurity
public interface BaseCustomFieldService<CF extends CustomField>
extends Service

Base interface for services of each custom field nature

Author:
luis
